appDescription.message: Manage and quickly switch between your Salesforce orgs in the Arc browser.

fillFieldsAlert.message: Please fill in both Org Alias and URL.

confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this Org?

noCliOrgsAvailable.message: No CLI Orgs found. Make sure CLI is configured and orgs are authorized.

orgOpenError.message: Failed to open Org {0} via CLI: {1}

serverNotRunningError.message: Error: Local server is not running. Please start it.
